relnotes.name: Common TSY

defect.title: RMmCustomAPI::TNetworkModeCaps needs a special "unknown" value

relnotes.defect: Added a new value to RMmCustomApi::TNetworkModeCaps to represent "unknown" mode coming from baseband to CTSY.

defect.title: Fixed Dial Number problems in CTSY
Unexpected error note pops up after creating emergency call

relnotes.defect: Common TSY treats KErrGsmReleaseByUser as a normal LTSY HangUp return code rather than as an error.

defect.title: ETel server crashes when LTSY returns no message router

deliverystep.name: PREQ1854: Baseband Adaptation: CTSY support for NotifyDynamicCapsChange ETel Multimode API

defect.title: MmTsy_IPCdefs.h is out of sync with S60 version
gsmerror.h is out of sync with S60's version
CTSY classes for Telephony Audio control have been deemed badly named
A call without caps KCapsJoin was added to conference successfully
Status of conference call was modified mistakenly after swap it several times
CTSY crashes emulator when call ModifyActiveContext after delete the context
Propagation of CTSY external defect fixes
A voice call can go one to one before it's added to a conference call
Event EConferenceTerminated can't be gotten after hang up a conference call
RCall::Connect without arguments for data call return an error

relnotes.defect: Fixed the CustomAPI WINSCW DEF file, which had been changed by mistake.

defect.title: ETel server panics when activating R99_R4 context
@prototype APIs in telephony

relnotes.defect: Fixed the error by changing the tags to released.

defect.title: The secondary context can be activated after all of the packet filters were removed

relnotes.defect: Fixed the error of by making the secondary contextect activation beahviour proper after the packet filter removal.

defect.title: CTSY component test suite is exporting an epoc.ini file when it shouldn't be

relnotes.defect: Fixed the error of exporting epoc.ini file and changed the docs and iby file accordingly.

defect.title: Dialling a emergency call in second thread causes PANIC - Etel Server Code = 3

relnotes.defect: Fixed the cause of PANIC by Setting the DialFlag and using it properly.

defect.title: Open line successfully but can not get notification of call status change

relnotes.defect: Fixed case handling of voice line name.

defect.title: CTSY need to return real caps (VMBX, MBDN) for client.

relnotes.defect: CTSY returns real capabilities for VMBX and MBDN phonebooks
relnotes.purpose: The Common TSY is a hardware independent TSY layer. It is the provider module for the ETel Core, Multimode ETel, Packet Data and ETel Custom APIs. The Common TSY implements the upper layer of the TSY and is designed to be independent of the Baseband and the Licensee TSY below.
